name: Hatchling
description:
This Game was originally created for ludum dare game jam and is now officially my first released game :)
So I hope you have fun playing it :D

To play this game, you only need 2 buttons (and mouse to click start Button).
The goal is to hatch the little dragon and you do that by keeping it's temperature stable. Which is not as easy as it sounds with just magical icecubes and Firebreath equipped.
